# Experiment 1 - Motion

```{r, echo=FALSE,message=FALSE}
source("processing/0_functions.R")

mean_v = list()
B = list()
t0 = list()
A = list()

ctr=0
for (wave in c('early','late')){
  for (group in c('firstyear','community','mturk')){
    ctr=ctr+1
    load(paste0("data/derived/final_samples_exp1_",group,"_",wave,".RData"))
    
    #get posterior predictives
    parms = get_parms_exp1(converged_samples)
    mean_v[[ctr]]=parms$mean_v
    B[[ctr]]=parms$B
    t0[[ctr]]=parms$t0
    A[[ctr]]=parms$A
    
  }
}
```

## Mean Drift Rate (v)

```{r, echo=FALSE,message=FALSE}
mean_v = bind_rows(mean_v)
print(head(mean_v))
```
